Reviews.Title: Very low quality images, not worth $25 let alone $70!
Reviews.Author: Liz
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a lightning deal the other day.  I've been wanting a waterproof camera for years, and decided to finally take the plunge.  As soon as it arrived, I took quite a few pictures, both indoors and out.  They are all very low quality.  12mp? Please.  My cellphone takes way higher quality pictures than this little "gem".  Camera is also very small - makes the button placement awkward.  Also, the buttons and their functions are no where near an intuitive as a regular camera.Returning this ASAP.  I will stick with a well known brand next time!

Reviews.Title: Dont let the 12 megapixel fool you
Reviews.Author: HENRY LUONG
Reviews.Content: 12 Megapixels sure, but be forewarned the images comes out like gif images rather than JPG images.  While this camera is indeed waterproof.  The pictures are horriBAD.

Reviews.Title: Hard to place battery and memory card
Reviews.Author: George Oani
Reviews.Content: very hard to open and place the battery and memory card. but came in a green color that my wife likes

Reviews.Title: wonderful litte camera
Reviews.Author: georeg spuckler
Reviews.Content: It take great pic's and it has batteries no recharging issues not to  say it also water proof for all my outdoor activities

Reviews.Title: Wonderful product
Reviews.Author: MissTia
Reviews.Content: Preformed perfectly. Beautiful pictures and completely waterproof. I'm glad it is shock proof as my three children play with it frequently.

ProductInfo.Features:
12.0 Megapixel resolution with 8x digital zoom
Waterproof up to 10-Feet
2.4-Inch LCD screen display
Uses Micro SD cards up to 16 GB (not included)
Uses two AAA batteries (Included)
ProductInfo.Name: Bell+Howell Splash WP10-BL 12.0 Megapixel Waterproof Digital Camera with 2.4-Inch LCD (Blue)
